entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TauroxDescription
entry.value: Heavy APC with dual autocannons, extra manned weapons, and communication equipment.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TauroxFlavor
entry.value: The Taurox is a heavily armoured transport that is armed with heavy weapons. While not as flexible as a Chimera, it's more akin to a tank in terms of firepower and armour.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TauroxIFVDescription
entry.value: Heavy IFV with a twin-linked autocannon, a multitude of manned weapons, and communication equipment. Has fewer cargo slots compared to a typical Taurox.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TauroxIFVFlavor
entry.value: Typically, Tauroxes and Taurox Primes are used to breach enemy lines and gain a foothold. Tortuga Pattern Tauroxes turn that foothold into a strongpoint.
